definition: to play with/to wield/to act (cool etc)/to display (a skill, one's temper etc)
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Drop the gun, and no funny stuff!
I don't like to play cards with people who cheat.
sentences.chinese: 我不願意同打牌時耍花樣的人打牌。

sentences.english: Hey, tell me the truth. And don't get smart with me.
sentences.chinese: 嘿，告訴我實情，少在我面前耍花樣。

sentences.english: Don't play games with me any more. I have no patience.
sentences.chinese: 不要再跟我耍花樣，我沒有耐心。

sentences.english: And don't forget what you're playing for.
sentences.chinese: 還有別忘了你耍花樣的代價。
